name: Freekick - Nojd's Touch of Blue, v. 1.7
description:
I've replaced the blue and orange menus, lines, titles et.c. with blue versions of the original design.

Version 1.3: Made the corners of the tactics box look better and changed the color of the Achievements Headlines and Player Training History Headlines to blue.

Version 1.4: Updated to work with the new left side menu design.

Version 1.5: Updated to work with the new language selector background.

Version 1.6: July 20, 2009: Updated to work with the new site design of title bars.

Version 1.7: September 24, 2009: Updated to work with the new site design of language selector and top help bar.
